name: uae-extension
description: Universal Accessibility Enhancer browser extension (multi-browser scaffold)

scripts.build:chrome: npm run prepare-build && node scripts/build.js chrome
scripts.build:firefox: npm run prepare-build && node scripts/build.js firefox
scripts.build:all: npm run prepare-build && node scripts/build.js chrome && node scripts/build.js firefox
scripts.zip:all: npm run build:all && node scripts/zip.js chrome && node scripts/zip.js firefox
scripts.test:all: npm run verify && npm test && npm run test:e2e
scripts.test:complete: npm run test:all && npm run test:e2e:websites && npm run test:e2e:visual && npm run test:e2e:firefox && npm run test:e2e:performance
